tool.name: Fasta Statistics
tool.description: Display summary statistics for a fasta file.

param.name: dataset
param.label: fasta or multifasta file
param.help: fasta dataset to get statistics for.

param.name: genome_size
param.label: Genome size estimate (optional)
param.help: Estimate of the genome size in bases. If specified, NG50 and LG50 will be calculated.

tool.help:
**Fasta Stats** Displays the summary statistics for a fasta file.
------
Outputs in tabular form: Lengths: n50, min, max, median and average
Number of base pairs: A, C, G, T, N, Total and Total_not_N
Number of sequences
GC content in %
If an optional genome size estimate is specified, then the NG50 length will also be calculated.
------
Inputs:
Fasta dataset
